title: Breastfeeding while being pregnant
transcript: This was at the beginning of Islam. The prophet wasallam forbade people forbade women who um conceived who got pregnant to breastfeed the children. And after a while he said I denied you from doing this but I've noticed that the uh Bzantians and the Romans the Christians are doing it and it is not harming their children. Therefore it is okay for you to do it. And this is the most uh uh and the latest opinion that it is per completely permissible for uh a pregnant woman to breastfeed her child while being pregnant. And there's nothing wrong in that
